website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a fast and capable indoor grill that can whip up meals for a family, the T-fal is your best choice.
pros: Stands out for its 1800 watt heating element, which promises fast and even cooking for burgers, sandwiches, red meat, fish, and more
cons: Some users have to recalibrate to get it working correctly

customer_reviews.title: Bacon from this thing is amazing, and though I was suspicious of the frozen ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the OptiGrill XL at the end of August 2016, and have used it mostly for rib eye steaks, chicken breasts and bacon. It has been outstanding in all regards. Bacon from this thing is amazing, and though I was suspicious of the frozen to done capability it worked flawlessly. The grill plates fit in the dishwasher ( Bosch ) and come out clean. I have been looking for accessories for this grill and additional grill plates, but have not found them yet. Prof Mayfield
customer_reviews.author: Ross Mayfield

customer_reviews.title: So fast I did not believe it at first.
customer_reviews.text: At first I was a little cautious as to how fast this think cooked a steak. I did waited a little longer as I simply did not trust it. Man was I worried for nothing. It was a little bit overdone as I let it go longer. it was a solid medium well. I generally do a medium to slightly medium rare. still super juicy and not dry at all. The wife likes her steak at a medium well and hers was spot on and juicy too. cleanup is easy and no grease splatter. love this thing...
customer_reviews.author: GM77

customer_reviews.title: Great product easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Its great just takes a little time to get use to using it. Nothing cleans easier. I just put the cooking parts in the dishwasher. We've cooked frozen steak. It was perfect. Had a couple things that were just under done. (Pork chops and burgers). So that's a learning curve. The food tastes better than we thought it would. Chicken comes out tender and juicy. We're glad we purchased the large size.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Green

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a grill because I couldn’t eat fried foods. I went to order me a George Foreman but my son talked me into ordering this one. Wish I had read reviews before I ordered. Can’t cook meat with bone in. Which I like Center Cut Pork Chops. My hamburgers looked like the little thin H.B. from McDonalds flatten it out big time. My grill now sits in my back storage room. Used. It twice. Dont waste your mo yes on it. I always heard the better the price the better the product but not true for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most Used Kitchen Item
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the 2nd one we have. I had gotten the first one (regular size one) and we love it. Then I found out about this XL size one and got it for my husband for Father's Day which is nice when the kids are eating with this. This grill gets used several times a week, sometimes more than once a day. The temperature guide works great, especially for steaks when we each like them cooked differently. It is very simple to use and clean. Would recommend to anyone looking for a great electric grill!
customer_reviews.author: Tahnee Young

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last, Don't Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in May 2018 and in June 2019 it began to have serious problems with the controls. Also didn't cook very well and the signal lights failed to work. Kept showing deep red, even before putting the meat on the grill. Thought I did something wrong but after several tries found that it was the grill itself. Tried several times to let it cool and begin all over again, still didn't work. After investigating my warranty information I found little to no help. Good idea but bad product. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My brother purchased one for his place a while back and I loved the simplicity of the product. It's very easy to use and does a great job! The only thing I had difficulty with, and this may be user error, was cooking brats. The outer layer is cooked nicely but the inner area is still raw/not fully cooked.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Fool Proof!
customer_reviews.text: I was always intimidated by cooking meat. Now that I have this I am pretty confident about making dinner for my family. The grill plates simply pop on and off and can go in the dishwasher along with the drip pan. The grill let's you know when your meat is done. So far everything has been great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mallery

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled about this grill!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite favorite favorite kitchen stuff ever!!! I regret why didn't I purchased earlier. It is very simple to use ( I watched couple youtube reviews and tutorials and I was ready to use!) and the taste blew my mind. Very delicious! My family prasied about the grill techniques and I really can't expect any better. I would highly recommend for anyone who is looking for the electric grill.
customer_reviews.author: Mama koo

customer_reviews.title: Optigrill is great for meats, panini sandwiches and more.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use no mess cooking with auto temp control. Cooking plates are quick release and dishwasher safe. Grease is drained during cooking which is very fast. Make sure you preheat as instructed.
customer_reviews.author: Graymond

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grill
customer_reviews.text: Great Grill, I have made paninis, grilled chicken, bacon, grilled cheese sandwiches. Has a power on and off button, able to select the types of meats and breads plus more. Use Daily. Easy to clean, which makes my grill look like new again, especially because I leave on my kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: JGM

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should own one.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two of these. One I used and liked it so much I bought one for my daughter. She also likes it. Everything I have cooked has come out perfect. I especially like the salmon on it. Since we are short term renters I don't have a lot of supplies. We cooked the salmon as is. No spices or dressing on it. Just plain, It was the best. I recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice indoor grill
customer_reviews.text: It is good for the Winter time when it is too cold for the grill. One of the reviews said it does not smoke but that is not the case. So I use it right out side my patio door. You do not get the quality sear as from a grill but it is ok.
customer_reviews.author: pc

customer_reviews.title: better off using oven
customer_reviews.text: Does not work after a few weeks, chicken is raw, fish is raw , thats even when it tells you its ready, better off using oven, so its just collecting dust for me,
customer_reviews.author: SomGuyOnAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Will Not Maintain High Temperature
customer_reviews.text: Will not even leave grill marks on the meat even when meat is at room temperature when starting to cook. Very disappointed, add is misleading. Regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Willie

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for dad ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my father. I have one he liked so I purchased a bigger one for him . So far so good. Let’s see how long it last.
customer_reviews.author: JayCamLoVE

customer_reviews.title: Terrible grill
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Doesnt work properly. We used to have Cuisine Art Grill and were very happy with that for 5 years. We thought this time try Tfal.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and easy cooking
customer_reviews.text: The best part is the face that it is so easy to clean! Made chicken and fish and turned out great and very tender. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Wubzy

customer_reviews.title: Won't do various meat settings after over a year of use
customer_reviews.text: had the product for a while and when it worked it was amazing. It now doesn't do any damn meat setting - just switches to hottest manual setting if you try
customer_reviews.author: Sonic Boom

customer_reviews.title: EVERYTHING ABOUT THIS GRILL IS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Best indoor grill I've owned, and I've owned several. It cooks perfectly every time and the larger size is great when grilling for the whole family. Cleanup is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Albert M.

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I cook alot more, and I enjoy having more options than just pan fried and baked. It cooks everything at the right temp and time, so I can set it up and then focus on the rest of the meal without having to check on it. This is a must for meal preppers like me.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W Porter

customer_reviews.title: Easy and precise cooking every time.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best kitchen grills I've ever bought. I like that I can put frozen meat on it and it does the rest. It's so easy to use and everything I've cook with it has turned out perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: AdiGilarmo

customer_reviews.title: instructions did not seem very clear on how to vacuum the air out.
customer_reviews.text: Just used for the first time. Instructions did not seem very clear on how to vacuum the air out. I think I may have figured it out, will try again on next go around.
customer_reviews.author: N. Hess

customer_reviews.title: Makes cooking easier
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s been great haven’t had problems. To meat has turned out fine as long as follow steps and pick right settings. Saves time. Not heavy so I think it might easily break if it accidentally drop it.
customer_reviews.author: anyone

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Good higher quality George Forman but would not purchase again. The automated temperature control is a little overrated in my opinion. I still have to judge by eye versus trusting the grill's sensors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So glad I did
customer_reviews.text: Update: I've had this for not quite 2 years now. It completely quit working - while I was cooking. For the price this costs, I would expect it to work longer. I am disapointed and am not eligible to return or replace it. My Foreman grills lasted longer and were much, much cheaper. I've had several Foreman Brand Grills over the years. I was tired of replacing them and thought I would try something new. So glad I did! The sensor cooking works great (not perfect with everything, still working on fish) and I love the removeable plates.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended! Perfect steaks every time
customer_reviews.text: We upgraded from our ceramic plate optigril to this oversized one. It has some improvements including small tabs that keep your food from sliding off the plates, temperature control options and more. Highly recommended! Perfect steaks every time!
customer_reviews.author: TLC

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: At first, this product was great! A week later, it automatically set itself to manual, disabling different food features. I called Amazon and they replaced it free of charge. A week or so goes by and the new machine does the same thing. I did all the trouble shooting as instructed by pamphlet. Still would not change back to enabling all features. I give this product a terrible score for this reason alone. The concept is great though!
customer_reviews.author: Chris haynes

customer_reviews.title: this is not an XL 8 serving grill size!
customer_reviews.text: Love all the features of presets however, the xl grill size is not large enough for 8 servings; more a 4-5 serving size! Disappointed:(
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT GRILL
customer_reviews.text: Preheats quickly. Great time saver. The different settings make in possible to grill just about anything.
customer_reviews.author: RPM

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: I was sooo excited unpacking this grill. Carefully unpacked, read directions, cleaned as directed, plugged in and preheated to cook first burger. After about 2 minutes i heard a small pop and it shut down!!! Could not get grill to turn on again!! On my way to UPS store ..... don't buy!!
customer_reviews.author: linda mays

customer_reviews.title: Love it but small con
customer_reviews.text: Will definitely buy another if needed. Only con is when you’re making multiple batches of bacon and you’re using the setting the heat sensor still goes through the preheat cycle though it’s heated.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Love it but it’s smoking 🤦🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: I love it except it has smoke coming out of it when it’s heating up . I’m hoping it’s because it’s new 🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Florence

customer_reviews.title: What a blessing! The prime asset in my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 3 of these devices and never resented it. It is very easy to use and to clean. There is no competition. Originally, I bought 2 of the smaller type. They were excellent and I wanted a larger one. Now, I often cook an entire healthy meal on a single surface.
customer_reviews.author: Zafer Kizir

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. This thing cooks quickly
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. This thing cooks quickly. Looks great. I've cooked chicken, steaks, shrimp, fish, pork chops, grilled sandwiches, and potato wedges so far. All have been outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin M. Sandel

customer_reviews.title: great indoor grill
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my boyfriend because he had the smaller version and it was getting old and worn, this size is a lot more convenient for the 2 of us and holds a considerable amount more than the original size. quality has been great and everything we’ve cooked so far has come out perfectly. worth the money for sure.
customer_reviews.author: helena dyer

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean but drys meat out too much
customer_reviews.text: this really seems to dry the meat out so much and although its easy to clean up its not working as well as i would have liked , my husband likes his steak medium but this seems not to be able to just cook medium without drying the whole steak : (
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Best indoor grill I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: I have been through several indoor grills over the years and this one is perfect for all food types. It cooks evenly and perfectly every time, with a large cooking area. Easy to clean, easy to use. I truly love this grill.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mertz

customer_reviews.title: This is the best what I bought for the kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: this is the best I bought for the kitchen! very easy to cook steaks. nothing burns, it always turns out deliciously cook any kind of meat.
customer_reviews.author: Artem

customer_reviews.title: Every household should have one of these
customer_reviews.text: I love the Opti-Grill XL. Every household should have one!!! Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: CyndiG

customer_reviews.title: Horrible: Smells like burning plastic and stays on Manual mode
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely hated this grill the only mode it would work in was manual. Whenever I turned it on it smelled like melted plastic and it totally destroyed my organic chicken tenders had to throw the whole package in the garbage the grill lines looked like plastic it was weird hard to describe the chicken tasted horrible
customer_reviews.author: crystal shelven

customer_reviews.title: Still practicing, very easy, perfection takes time.
customer_reviews.text: It works beautiful, just takes time to get used to how your like your dinner, sometimes it takes few tries for perfection, I fel quite confident that when accustomed to using more, it will be fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: granny

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: We have the first one that came out, what a difference the new one is. Hotter, more choices and bigger. Very happy with my purchase, sent quickly and no problems. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Peg K

customer_reviews.title: OMG!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this grill!! I’m so mad at myself for not getting one sooner! It does everything I need to do and I enjoy cooking now. It’s no longer a chore.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Pippen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small servings
customer_reviews.text: Great for small meals. Kids moved out great for one steak or small servings. So far cooked everyrhing perfect. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great for steaks.
customer_reviews.text: Had a smaller version and needed to cook more than one do got the larger. Perfect..
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Keeps this lazy bachelor fed with minimal effort.
customer_reviews.text: It's so easy to use. I cook chicken, steak, sausage, and burgers perfectly every time, on demand, in less than 10 minutes. My dinner entrees are always freshly cooked. I've always been a skinny guy, wanting to gain weight. I eat twice as much meat now, and I'm very happy about it. :)
customer_reviews.author: BluJAE

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, Too heavy upper grill squashes delicate items and all items for that matter.
customer_reviews.text: Upper grill too heavy, it will destroy delicate items, fish, real sausages, veggies, etc You got to be able to control the weight the upper grill exerts on food items, Had to return it.

customer_reviews.title: This grill is AMAZING!! It cooks fast to the perfect point
customer_reviews.text: This grill is AMAZING!! It cooks fast to the perfect point. I’ve used it with Peppers, Chicken, Steak and Pork and everything comes out perfect EVERY TIME!!!! Love it

customer_reviews.title: This product works okay, it doesn't really cook the ...
customer_reviews.text: This product works okay, it doesn't really cook the food well done, as I put a hamburger inside I have to cook it twice because it not cooked well done. It does cook really fast and I try cooking frozen chicken breast and it did his job. But again not well done.
customer_reviews.author: alberto

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effective.
customer_reviews.text: It is the best indoor grille I have ever used. It is uncomplicated to operate, with identifiable symbols for each item to be cooked and a signal indicating when it is ready at your desired preference. Outstanding.

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend because it is very easy to use, easy to clean and food is delicious.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for most stuff but under cooks meat.
customer_reviews.text: It’s simple to program and easy to clean. It unfortunately under cooks meat. One example I made boneless chicken using programmed time. Chicken was under done so had to auto set and cook It a few minutes longer.

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and it does its job very well! Perfect for what I need!

customer_reviews.title: Simplest way to cook meal on counter quick

Everything come out great and juicy. You just have to use the color cards that come with it for rare medium well down It is the best. I went for bigger one and glad it did Give you more space. I would suggest the bigger one Keith

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: So far we love this. Lots of room for cooking.

product_meta.title: T-fal GC722D53 1800W OptiGrill XL Stainless Steel Large Indoor Electric Grill with Removable and Dishwasher Safe Plates, Silver
product_meta.description: Style Name:Auto Sensor Contact Grill| Size:8-ServingsCook food to perfection with the T fal OptiGrill + XL GC722D53 electric indoor grill. With three additional programs and a 33% larger grilling surface than the original OptiGrill +, the OptiGrill + XL offers added versatility and convenience. Choose from nine pre set programs: Burger, Poultry, Sandwich, Sausage, Red Meat and Fish, as well as Pork, Bacon and Shellfish. The grill's precision grilling technology with sensors measures the thickness of food for auto cooking based on the program selected. When the flashing light turns solid purple, the grill has properly preheated place food on the grill, lower the lid and it takes care of the rest. A cooking level indicator light changes from yellow to orange to red signifying the cooking progress with audible beeps that alert when food gets to each stage: rare, medium and well done. Take food off the grill once it's reached your preferred level of doneness. Along with the nine pre set programs, the electric grill provides two additional cooking options: Frozen mode for defrosting and fully cooking frozen food and Manual mode with four temperature settings for cooking vegetables or personal recipes. (Note: when preheating for a pre set program, keep the lid closed or the grill will automatically switch to Manual mode.) The OptiGrill + XL features a powerful 1800 watt heating element, user friendly controls ergonomically located on the handle and die cast aluminum plates with a nonstick coating for effortless food release. The slightly angled cooking plates allow fat to run away from food and into the drip tray for healthier results and the drip tray and cooking plates are removable and dishwasher safe for quick cleanup. Housed in brushed stainless steel, the OptiGrill + XL electric indoor grill makes an attractive addition to any counter. A recipe book is included. Cooking surface 800 cm²
feature_bullets: Powerful 1800 watt electric indoor grill cooks food automatically based on thickness of food and program selected
9 auto cooking programs: Burger, Poultry, Sandwich, Sausage, Red Meat, Fish, Pork, Bacon and Shellfish. Handle Thermoplastic
Preheating/ready indicator light; indicator light and audible beeps for rare, medium and well done make it easy to monitor the cooking progress
Frozen mode for cooking frozen food; Manual mode with 4 temperature settings for cooking vegetables or personal recipes. Power cord length - 0.8 m
Ergonomic control panel on handle; die cast aluminum nonstick plates for effortless food release; dishwasher safe drip tray and plates; recipe book included
